About.Hours & facilities: Open by appointment only on Tuesdays and Wednesdays.

About.Access: Advance notice of visit essential. Reference assistance available by email, phone and mail. Some research may require the permission of the Principal and the School Council.

About.Acquisition focus: Meriden Archives reflect the operation of the School as an educational body for the past 108 years. Records primarily consist of Council Minutes, Administrative records, Staff and Student records, School magazines, a photographic collection, plans, uniforms and memorabilia.

About.Major holdings: School Magazines. Minutes, School Council. Administrative records. Photographs.
